sentences.english: This case is in yesterday afternoon court of more beautiful district is sessional .

sentences.english: Yuexiu District of Guangzhou is the oldest in the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 越秀區是廣州中最古老的中心城區。

sentences.english: My name is Chen Xiaoping, from Yuexiu, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我叫陳小萍來自廣州越秀區。
